pizzas.name: Garden Fresh Pizza
pizzas.description: All your favorite veggies together on a delightfully delicious pizza. Loaded with crisp green peppers, fresh-cut onions, mushrooms, ripe black olives, vine-ripened Roma tomatoes, and real cheese made from mozzarella.

pizzas.name: Cheese Pizza
pizzas.description: Everyone loves the classics, just cheese and our famous sauce.
